Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.) 

---

 Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
cbval.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
cbval.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
cbval.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvex $p |- ( E. x ph <-> E. y ps ) $.
